title: Tax toxic pesticides to address market failure

content.question: Which of the following is a government policy that is intended to address a market failure?

choices.label: Taxing the use of toxic pesticides by farmers
Fining firms that outsource jobs to lower labor costs
Subsidizing corn farmers who face increasing production costs
Taxing short-run profits in competitive markets
Subsidizing entry of firms into a market with an existing natural monopoly

content.answer: Taxing the use of toxic pesticides by farmers

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

topic.text: 6.4: The Effects of Government Intervention in Different Market Structures
